title: 5 ways to attract top tech talent, according to these business leaders
description: If you're a manager looking to attract great IT professionals, here's how to make your organization stand out from the crowd.

title: Stop! Your Apple charger may be a counterfeit, and this tiny gadget can tell
description: This USB-C tester is like a mini-computer that tells you the good, the bad, and the ugly about your charger.
